about_the_game:
Blast off with the Cobalt Core Original Soundtrack! Get stuck in the timeloop with over 90 minutes of catchy and electrifying original music by composer Aaron Cherof (Minecraft, Sunshine Heavy Industries, Moment to Midnight).

Cobalt Core is a sci-fi roguelike deckbuilder with a deep new single-axis combat system! Dodge missiles, line up your cannons, and blast your enemies out of the sky! Then get to the bottom of these time loops, before it's too late...
